source: TEXT_GAIUSB311_00852_SEQ_00<tab>Ever capricious, Master Gegeruju demands to know how his colibri are faring.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB311_00852_SEQ_00<tab>コスタ・デル・ソルのゲゲルジュは、コリブリが気になっているようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB311_00852_SEQ_01<tab>It seems poachers are luring the colibri northward with feed. Speak with them, but beware, for they bear you little love.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB311_00852_SEQ_01<tab>コリブリに餌付けをしている密猟者がいるらしい。コスタ・デル・ソル北にいる「荒々しい密猟者」に話しかけよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB311_00852_SEQ_02<tab>The poachers say they are well within their rights to hunt the birds. Place the roselles along the specified trail to lure the colibri back.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB311_00852_SEQ_02<tab>ブラッドショアで活動しているのだから問題はない、と主張する密猟者。「指定地点」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E871501 /var>」を使い、コリブリをコスタ・デル・ソルにおびき寄せよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB311_00852_SEQ_03<tab>You have placed the flowers along the specified trail. Speak with the angry poachers again.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB311_00852_SEQ_03<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E871501 /var>を設置した。もう一度「荒々しい密猟者」と話をしよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB311_00852_SEQ_04<tab>Costa del Sol, jewel of the coast─and once a pioneer town built by the selfsame men now reduced to poaching colibri. Report the discovery to Master Gegeruju.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB311_00852_SEQ_04<tab>密猟者は、コスタ・デル・ソルの元開拓民だったようだ。コスタ・デル・ソルの「ゲゲルジュ」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB311_00852_SEQ_05<tab>The clash over the colibri is over. Both sides have their story, and each are convinced of the other's baseness. You are of course simply the messenger─or have you unknowingly chosen a side?
target: TEXT_GAIUSB311_00852_SEQ_05<tab>コリブリをめぐる戦いは幕を閉じた。しかし、ゲゲルジュにはゲゲルジュの、開拓民には開拓民の言い分があるようだ……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB311_00852_TODO_01<tab>Place bouquets of Oschon roselles along the specified trail.

TEXT_GAIUSB311_00852_GEGERUJU_000_000<tab>You see all those wild colibri? Not one of them was originally here─though the alchemical question of where <var 1A 02 /var>here<var 1A 01 /var> is, that's something we can munch many almonds over. 'Twas I that bred, fed, and released the birds.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB311_00852_GEGERUJU_000_000コスタ・デル・ソルの周囲におるコリブリはのう、
もとは、ワシが飼っておったコリブリなのじゃ。
ワシのもとから逃げだして、今は野良になっておるがのう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB311_00852_GEGERUJU_000_001<tab>So of course, they are still <var 1A 02 /var>mine<var 1A 01 /var>. Or, if they belong to themselves, certainly no one else owns them. At least not more than I own them. Where was I? Oh yes, <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> colibri are being poached!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB311_00852_GEGERUJU_000_001じゃが、逃げだしたとはいえ、
ワシの領地にいるってことは、ワシのコリブリじゃろう？
それなのに、勝手に狩っていく不届き者がおるのじゃよ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB311_00852_GEGERUJU_000_002<tab>The miscreants hang just outside the boundary of Costa del Sol─sly, sly─and entice the colibri with feed. They should not be doing such a thing, such an ungentlemanly thing. Won't you parley with them?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB311_00852_GEGERUJU_000_002奴らは、コスタ・デル・ソルのギリギリ外側で、
コリブリを餌付けしては、狩っていってるようでのう。
……だれか、話をつけてくれんかのう～？

source: TEXT_GAIUSB311_00852_GEGERUJU_000_003<tab>And if you can't talk sense to them, we'll just have to lure the birds back using these flowers. My colibri love roselle nectar, I happen to know. Why? Because I bred them and fed them!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB311_00852_GEGERUJU_000_003そうじゃのう～、話し合いが成立しないようじゃったら、
この「」を使って、
コリブリを呼び戻せばよいかのう～。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB311_00852_POACHER_000_010<tab>Back off, this is Bloodshore. We're not in Costa del Sol, and that means we don't have to live by your master's say-so!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB311_00852_POACHER_000_010ふん、ここは「ブラッドショア」だ！
ゲゲルジュの領地「コスタ・デル・ソル」じゃねぇ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSB311_00852_POACHER_000_011<tab>Yeah, Bloodshore's not a part of his little fiefdom! We're free folk here, not bought 'n' paid for like the lot in Costa.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB311_00852_POACHER_000_011ブラッドショアで我々が何をしようと、
ゲゲルジュの野郎に、文句を言われる筋合いはねぇなあ！
TEXT_GAIUSB311_00852_DUMMY_000_020<tab>コスタ・デル・ソルに「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E871501 /var>」を使う×3

source: TEXT_GAIUSB311_00852_POACHER_000_025<tab>Damn that Gegeruju... He thinks he can buy everything. We built Costa del Sol by the sweat of our brows, did he tell you that? I know every cobble of the streets, laid 'bout half of them myself. It was a pioneer town, a good town.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB311_00852_POACHER_000_025くそ……ゲゲルジュ、いやらしいやつ！
もとはといえば、コスタ・デル・ソルだって、
俺らが開拓した集落だったんじゃねえか！

source: TEXT_GAIUSB311_00852_POACHER_000_026<tab>Then that moneybags swooped in and took it all. Stay as a lackey or leave as a free man, those were the pickings. Then he took the beach─no more fishing without his say-so. And now he takes the colibri.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB311_00852_POACHER_000_026それを、大金積んで全部奪いやがって……！
今度はなんて高価なものを使ってまで、
コリブリを奪っていくのか、あの強欲ジジイめ！！

source: TEXT_GAIUSB311_00852_POACHER_000_027<tab>He leaves us nothing. We came out here with a bit, built a town, and now we have nothing. Know why the poor get poorer? It's because the rich get a <var 1A 02 /var>notion<var 1A 01 /var> to get richer. Every time Gegeruju gets that notion, he sends out someone like you to take another thing away from us.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB311_00852_POACHER_000_027俺らには、何も残されないっていうのかよ！
集落も、砂浜も、コリブリさえも……！
……ゲゲルジュ！！

source: TEXT_GAIUSB311_00852_GEGERUJU_000_040<tab>Ha, that settles their hash. And now, they have yet another bone to pick with me. The Twelve know I have many a skeleton in my closet─don't read too much into that, m'dear─but those settlers have quite the ossuary!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB311_00852_GEGERUJU_000_040ホッホッホ～、密猟者たちは諦めよったか。
まったく、開拓民の逆恨みは迷惑じゃのう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB311_00852_GEGERUJU_000_041<tab>Costa del Sol was Admiral Merlwyb's hobby-horse. She had an idea to settle this area and so brought a number of folk on indenture. The terms were <var 1A 02 /var>very<var 1A 01 /var> generous. Hardly anyone died, a credit to her leadership.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB311_00852_GEGERUJU_000_041このコスタ・デル・ソルは、
もともとメルウィブ提督の入植プロジェクトで、
「集落」として開拓されておったのじゃ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB311_00852_GEGERUJU_000_042<tab>Yes, very creditable. But she had no head for business─kept trying to farm this salty land. I stepped in and saved her from ruin. You see Costa del Sol now, a jewel of commerce and culture, but I assure you it was not thus when I purchased it.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB311_00852_GEGERUJU_000_042しかし塩気の多い土地柄、商品作物ができなくてのう。
メルウィブ提督が困っておったから、
ワシが移住先として買い取ってあげたんじゃよ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB311_00852_GEGERUJU_000_043<tab>Many of the settlers have stayed and prospered! Why, a good third of my household was once raw pioneer. But, some people are like figs─they want to stay the same. Tiresome, I say. They've no one to blame but themselves.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB311_00852_GEGERUJU_000_043当時の開拓民の一部は、
ワシを逆恨みしておるようじゃがな。
まったく、迷惑な話じゃのう～。
